item.description:
The time of the new moon is a time to breathe in deeply and move into a calm state of mind. In this state, you can watch your emotions come and go and not be affected by them. In this calmness, you begin to see your life more clearly; you begin to see what is possible.

The new moon is the symbol of beginnings. This is a good time to contemplate upon your true motive.

 

Gong Bath Meditation is restorative for all. We will begin with a short set of exercises to help create  a deep meditation and then lie back to receive the deep resonating sounds of the gongs. An effective way to gather the monkey mind and simply settle down to enjoy  a healing, the stillness and slip away into sweet nothingness.

Excellent for all physical levels.

All a listener needs to do is relax and let the sound bathe the body and carry the mind into deep meditation.

The sound of the gong can be used to rebalance and tone the physical, emotional and spiritual bodies. It is an excellent therapy for stress related issues, depression, fatigue, anger and hostility, feelings of fear, separation and loneliness, along with many other conditions related to the lack of balance and harmony in the body.

Call Darnell with any questions at 857-526-2200
item.name: NEW MOON ~ Gong Bath Meditation with Darnell
